text_block_list.text:
That Uma Musume's course……could be called a long, long "journey". 
Everything I remember about her seems to shine just like gold――

Every one of the Uma Musume she competed with were 
truly talented and awe-inspiring. Her peers, her 
senpais, and her kouhais……she just kept chasing after them.

Without ever giving up, she continued her racing journey, 
seeking victory. Going as far as it would take her……and then――

Eventually, she obtained it for herself……finally 
obtaining a golden victory for herself. And then, in 
search of a new scenery, she set out on her next journey……

From that day forward, I had decided on my dream. As a trainer, 
I wanted to raise an "unforgettable" Uma Musume just like her――
choice_data_list: (――Or at least that's what I had hoped…….)

text_block_list.text:
I was still green and wasn't training an Uma Musume 
yet. My current situation was that whenever I tried 
to scout a girl that had potential, I was rejected.

But that just meant I had to stay positive and work 
hard to be reliable. When I went to the library to 
do some studying――one Uma Musume caught my attention.

………………………………………… 
All the way at the top, huh.

Thank you very much for earlier. I really needed these 
materials, so reaching out to me was really helpful.
choice_data_list: No, it was just a stepladder……

text_block_list.text:
I'm really grateful for that kindness though. It isn't much, 
but please allow me to show you at least a little hospitality.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Well, starting from the top……my name is Dream 
Journey. This is the 『Expeditionary Support 
Committee』 and I'm the acting president.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Oh, excuse me. I'll explain it to you shortly. 
But before that……is it fine to place this coffee here?

At that moment, a smoky scent reached my nose. 
Was it perfume? For a girl that seemed so delicate, 
it was quite the unexpected scent――

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
――Um, Trainer-san? 
Would it be alright to start explaining about this committee……?

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
The Expedition Support Committee, just as its name 
suggests, is a committee that supports expeditions. 
Racecourses exist in Japan as well as overseas, you see.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Arranging transportation and hotel accomadations, 
adjusting itineraries for excursions, and designating 
rest stops……we consult on all aspects of an expedition.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
I suppose it's just a lack of publicity. I would definitely 
like more people to work with us, however……unfortunately 
there aren't many that come for consultations.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Expeditions are just a part of daily life for Uma Musume…… 
so it's quite important. I consider our mission to be to 
fully support everyone on their journey.

Rather than just moving people around, she wanted to 
make it more enjoyable……judging by the amount of materials 
she had around the room, it was easy to see that.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, next time, bring your Uma Musume with you. 
Whatever it may be, I'd be happy to help.
choice_data_list: No, I don't have one yet……but

text_block_list.text:
I was planning to go talk to a certain Uma Musume 
tomorrow. Although I was anxious, it was still 
possible I could form a contract this time.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
I see. In that case……hopefully it will be a good 
opportunity. So that you can have a fruitful experience, 
we'll support you from behind the scenes.

――However, the next day. Even though I was excited 
and heading to the course……The girl that would be 
training today didn't show up and I couldn't contact her.

Recently, I've just been getting rejected by every 
girl I talk to. Even if there was a positive response, 
for some reason, the next day we couldn't meet.

Maybe the reason this keeps happening is there's 
something wrong with me. But because I didn't know 
why, I couldn't help but lose confidence in myself……

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Oh, Trainer-san. Thanks for yesterday―― 
……Um, is something wrong?

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
――I see. In that case…… 
If you'd like, how about watching over my training?

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Actually, I don't have a trainer yet…… If I could get 
an opinion from Trainer-san, it would be encouraging.

『I want your opinion』……right now, those words warmed my heart. 
I had plenty of time. I was really interested in how she would run.
choice_data_list: Please, let me take a look!
Please, let me take a look!

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Thank you for your gracious response. Please feel free to 
give your honest opinions……I'm looking forward to it.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text: Huuu……!

Her running style seemed to emphasize her leg movements…… 
much more than was normal. Because of her small build, 
it seemed like it would consume a lot of stamina――

But still, there was a sense of stability. 
She probably had a high amount of innate talent. 
It was easy to see with just a glance. Then, why――

When she returned, I asked Dream Journey about 
that, to which she smiled a little sadly.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
There isn't anyone that has any expectations of me. 
As you can tell, my build is a bit smaller than others……

The Uma Musume I had been cheering for also had a 
small build. Even then she raced hard and won big.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
I also don't think I'm lacking. However……if there 
isn't a trainer that can see that, then I can't debut.

It hurt my chest just a little. Considering 
her talent, it would be a waste to stay like 
this. I wanted to do something to help her――
choice_data_list: If you'd like, I can help with training?
If you'd like, I can help with training?

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
……Thank you very much. You really are a kind person. 
However……I must apologize.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
A contract between an Uma Musume needs to be formed. It's an 
important contract for the sake of running in the Twinkle series……

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
That an outstanding trainer like yourself still doesn't 
have an Uma Musume then……it must be because you're 
carefully scrutinizing who to make a contract with.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
But, you having to spend that precious time on me……weighs on me. 
……For an Uma Musume like me that noone has any expectations for……

I wanted to tell her that wasn't true at all. 
Without a doubt, she had potential. Being able to 
become her trainer would be a blessing for anyone.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
I appreciate the sentiments. Having you watch over 
me today was enough……well then, please excuse me.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text: ……Trainer-san?

If I didn't stop her now……I might not get another chance. 
Before I realized it, I spoke.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
――……Alright, I've confirmed it. I don't see any 
issue with this contract. I have no complaints.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Well then, I'll submit this myself…… 
……Are you really okay with this?

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
I may have gotten a little……swept up in the moment earlier. 
But, if you were only doing this out of kindness then……

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
……Thank you very much. 
It makes me really happy that you say that.
choice_data_list: What about you? Are you okay with this?
What about you? Are you okay with this?

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Of course. There isn't anyone more suitable than you. Well then…… 
once again, I'm looking forward to working with you.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Please just call me Journey. Everyone close 
to me calls me that……so please, Trainer-san.

And so, Dream Journey, a girl with a petite build, 
and I decided to aim for the Twinkle Series!
